name: hardhat-cross-chain
description: Template for cross-chain testing on Hardhat

scripts.friendly-msg: mkdir -p logs && echo 'Starting deployment. Check logs for details :)'
scripts.fork:ethereum: yarn friendly-msg && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=69 yarn hardhat customFork --n ethereum --b 21274700 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/ethereum-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:polygon: yarn friendly-msg && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=42  yarn hardhat node --fork https://polygon-mainnet.infura.io/v3/34275e86b45c41eda21e45cd56f0a379 --fork-block-number 66703587 --port 8546 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/polygon-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:sepolia: yarn friendly-msg && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=690 yarn hardhat customFork --n sepolia --b 7200064 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/sepolia-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:amoy: yarn friendly-msg && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=420 yarn hardhat customFork --n amoy --b 15975574 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/amoy-fork-node.log

author: Dan Hepworth <dhepworth@aktarytech.com>
